pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, May 8, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

Room 225-A
West Block
Parliament Hill

Bracebridge, Ontario

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a community BBQ held in recognition of the local first respondersâ€™ and volunteers' efforts during recent flooding in the area, and will deliver brief remarks.

Paramedic and Fire Station 1
225 Taylor Road

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive via the rear entrance, in the rear parking lot, no later than 5:30 p.m.
